org.logl.logl

Interface FileRotationListener


  • public interface FileRotationListener
    A listener for rotation events in RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void rotationCompleted(java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Invoked when rotation of output files is completed.
      void rotationError(java.lang.Exception e, java.io.PrintWriter out)
      Invoked when an exception occurs during rotation.

    • Method Detail

      • rotationCompleted

        void rotationCompleted(java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Invoked when rotation of output files is completed.
        Parameters:
        out - A PrintWriter that can be used to write content that will be added to the log when rotation has completed.

      • rotationError

        void rotationError(java.lang.Exception e,
                   java.io.PrintWriter out)
        Invoked when an exception occurs during rotation.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that occurred.
        out - A PrintWriter that can be used to write content that will be added to the log when rotation has completed.
